courseData.secret: This is a secret CIS class. You are not allowed to speak of this class outside of our classroom.
courseData.classwork: We will have classwork everyday. You are expected to already have the classwork done before I enter the room
courseData.questions: I will not answer any questions you have outside of the classroom that concerns this class or any work assigned. Please refer to the first item on this list
courseData.exams: We will have only one exam for the entire semester. This will count for 99% percent of your final grade. You will not be allowed to use a computer during the exam. All of your code must be hand written and work perfectly or you will fail.
